posts.title: Gold Avalon on 540 and Falls of Neuse - missed connections
posts.body: You were driving a gold Toyota Avalon on 540 east.  We drove alongside one another for a while, and then I was in front of you heading up Falls of Neuse.  We exchanged a few looks, and I was trying to get your attention back again as we made our way up Falls of Neuse.  You are an older lady with short blonde/dirty blonde hair.  I'd like to have coffee and a chat if you are interested.  What vehicle was I driving?

posts.title: We go to same gym - exchanged eye contact... - missed connections
posts.body: Seen you in gym several times and we always exchange glances but would like to have conversation and see if there is a connection between us.  Great legs and masculine guy.  Hit me back.

posts.title: Jared at Regal - missed connections
posts.body: I waited on your line even though the others were shorter. You look like a nice guy. Would love to get to know you. I'm seeing another movie on Thursday. Let's meet up? :)
